duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process expense claims of field personnel and ensure prompt and efficient payment of authorized claims in accordance with company stewardship of financial resource and procedures.
Handle inquiries in a prompt manner and make necessary corrections.

Determine whether field expenditures are within budgetary limits and are within company policies, being responsible for deciding to allow or disallow expenditures based on policy guidelines and budgetary limits.
Analyze expenditures, costs per item, exchange rate, etc. to determine appropriateness.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Business (Master's preferred)
